title: Impossible Mission
description: tay FOREVER! Avoid deadly robots and search for puzzle pieces in this classic action-platformer.

title: The Secret of Monkey Island
description: A wannabe pirate, Guybrush Threepwood, seeks adventure, love, and the legendary treasure of Monkey Island.

title: Turrican II: The Final Fight
description: Action-packed run and gun game with huge levels and memorable soundtrack.

title: Manic Miner.z80
description: A classic platformer where you must navigate treacherous levels to collect gems and escape. Prepare for intense action and near-impossible challenges!

title: Jet Set Willy.z80
description: Willy's back, and he's on a quest to collect all the items in his mansion before his wife returns.  Expect a massive house full of quirky obstacles and hidden treasures!
